00050 WaitForDnsSdServices::~WaitForDnsSdServices()
00051 {
00052     // Delete all search service
00053     ThreadSafeSection.EnterMutex();
00054     while( SearchServices.GetNumberOfElements() > 0 )
00055     {
00056         delete SearchServices.ExtractFirst();
00057     }
00058     ThreadSafeSection.LeaveMutex();
00059 }
00060
00061 bool WaitForDnsSdServices::IsServiceLocked( const SimpleString ServiceName )
00062 {
00063     if ( ServiceName.IsEmpty() )
00064     {
00065         return false;
00066     }
00067
00068     SimpleString ShortName = DnsSdService::GetDNSSDServiceNameFromFullName( ServiceName );
00069
00070     mutexServicesUsed.EnterMutex();
00071     if ( ServicesUsed.IsDefined( ShortName ) )
00072     {
00073         mutexServicesUsed.LeaveMutex();
00074         // OmiscidTrace( "       '%s' is locked.\n", ServiceName.GetStr() );
00075         return true;
00076     }
00077
00078     mutexServicesUsed.LeaveMutex();
00079     // OmiscidTrace( "   '%s' is not locked.\n", ServiceName.GetStr() );
00080     return false;
00081 }
00082
00083 bool WaitForDnsSdServices::LockService( const SimpleString ServiceName )
00084 {
00085     if ( ServiceName.IsEmpty() )
00086     {
00087         return false;
00088     }
00089
00090     SimpleString ShortName = DnsSdService::GetDNSSDServiceNameFromFullName( ServiceName );
00091
00092     mutexServicesUsed.EnterMutex();
00093     if ( ServicesUsed.IsDefined( ShortName ) )
00094     {
00095         mutexServicesUsed.LeaveMutex();
00096         // OmiscidTrace( "Lock '%s' is already set.\n", ServiceName.GetStr() );
00097         return false;
00098     }
00099
00100     ServicesUsed[ShortName] = SimpleString::EmptyString;        // identical to ServicesUsed[ServiceName] = NULL
00101     // OmiscidTrace( "Lock '%s' set.\n", ServiceName.GetStr() );
00102
00103     mutexServicesUsed.LeaveMutex();
00104
00105     return true;
00106 }
00107
00108 void WaitForDnsSdServices::UnlockService( const SimpleString ServiceName )
00109 {
00110     if ( ServiceName.IsEmpty() )
00111     {
00112         return;
00113     }
00114
00115     SimpleString ShortName = DnsSdService::GetDNSSDServiceNameFromFullName( ServiceName );
00116
00117     mutexServicesUsed.EnterMutex();
00118     ServicesUsed.Undefine( ShortName );
00119     mutexServicesUsed.LeaveMutex();
00120
00121     // OmiscidTrace( "Lock '%s' removed.\n", ServiceName.GetStr() );
00122     return;
00123 }
00124
00125 void FUNCTION_CALL_TYPE SearchService::DnsSdProxyServiceBrowseReply( unsigned int flags, const DnsSdService& CurrentService )
00126 {
00127     if ( flags & OmiscidDNSServiceFlagsAdd )
00128     {
00129         if ( IsResolved == true )
00130         {
00131             // Not me, I am already resolved...
00132             return;
00133         }
00134
00135         // We do not need to make \032 modification...
00136         SimpleString FullName = CurrentService.CompleteServiceName;
00137
00138         // If the search name == 0, we do check for every service, in all other case, we compare
00139         // The search name with the current service
00140         if ( SearchName.IsEmpty() || strncasecmp( (char*)SearchName.GetStr(), (char*)FullName.GetStr(), SearchName.GetLength() ) == 0 )
00141         {
00142             // Do we already consider this service ?
00143             if ( Parent->IsServiceLocked(FullName) )
00144             {
00145                 // yes, so exit
00146                 return;
00147             }
00148
00149             // Call the callback
00150             if ( CallBack )
00151             {
00152                 if ( CallBack( FullName.GetStr(), CurrentService.HostName.GetStr(), CurrentService.Port,
00153                     (uint16_t)CurrentService.Properties.GetTXTRecordLength(), (const char*)CurrentService.Properties.ExportTXTRecord(),
00154                     UserData) == false )
00155                 {
00156                     return;
00157                 }
00158             }
00159
00160             // We lock the full service Name to prevent multiple use of the same instance
00161             // of a service...
00162             if ( Parent->LockService( FullName ) == false )
00163             {
00164                 // already used...
00165                 return;
00166             }
00167
00168             // Fill the service informations
00169             Init( FullName, CurrentService.Port, CurrentService.HostName );
00170             Properties = CurrentService.Properties;
00171             IsResolved = true;
00172
00173             ++Parent->NbServicesReady;
00174         }
00175     }
00176     else
00177     {
00178         // remove a service
00179         if ( IsResolved == true )
00180         {
00181             // Maybe me, I am already resolved...
00182             if ( CurrentService.Name == Name )
00183             {
00184                 // Empty my DnsSdService part
00185                 Empty();
00186
00187                 // Let's say I am not resolve anymore
00188                 IsResolved = false;
00189                 --Parent->NbServicesReady;
00190             }
00191         }
00192     }
00193 }
00194
00195 bool SearchService::StartSearch( const SimpleString eName, const SimpleString eRegType, WaitForDnsSdServices * eParent, IsServiceValidForMe eCallBack, void * eUserData )
00196 {
00197     if ( eParent == (WaitForDnsSdServices *)NULL || (!eName.IsEmpty() && DnsSdService::CheckName( eName ) == false) )
00198     {
00199         return false;
00200     }
00201
00202     // Length of eNAme is checked by DnsSdService::CheckName
00203     SearchNameLength = 0;
00204     for( ;SearchNameLength < (int)eName.GetLength(); SearchNameLength++ )
00205     {
00206         SearchName[SearchNameLength] = eName[SearchNameLength];
00207     }
00208     SearchName[SearchNameLength] = '\0';
00209
00210     // we must at least put a name or give a callback
00211     // in all other case, we can not choose a service !
00212     if ( SearchNameLength == 0 && eCallBack == NULL )
00213     {
00214         return false;
00215     }
00216
00217     // Set internal members
00218     Parent = eParent;
00219     CallBack = eCallBack;
00220     UserData = eUserData;
00221
00222     // Everything is ready, return if we can start browse
00223     return StartBrowse();
00224 }
00225
00226 int WaitForDnsSdServices::NeedService( const SimpleString eName, const SimpleString eRegType, IsServiceValidForMe eCallBack, void * eUserData )
00227 {
00228     int PosOfNewSearchService;
00229     SearchService * pNewSearchService = new OMISCID_TLM SearchService;
00230
00231     ThreadSafeSection.EnterMutex();
00232
00233     if ( pNewSearchService == NULL )
00234     {
00235         ThreadSafeSection.LeaveMutex();
00236         return -1;
00237     }
00238
00239     if ( pNewSearchService->StartSearch( eName, eRegType, this, eCallBack, eUserData ) == false )
00240     {
00241         // Could not start search, destroy search service
00242         delete pNewSearchService;
00243         ThreadSafeSection.LeaveMutex();
00244         return -1;
00245     }
00246
00247     // Everything fine, so add it to my search list
00248     SearchServices.Add(pNewSearchService);
00249
00250     // compute virtual position of service
00251     PosOfNewSearchService = SearchServices.GetNumberOfElements() - 1;
00252
00253     ThreadSafeSection.LeaveMutex();
00254
00255     return PosOfNewSearchService; // Information about the service pos in the table
00256 }
00257
00258 bool WaitForDnsSdServices::WaitAll( unsigned int DelayMax )
00259 {
00260     bool Done;
00261
00262     if ( DelayMax == 0 )
00263     {
00264         // INFINITE wait
00265         Done = false;
00266         while( Done == false ) // was for(;;) but new version of MS compiler do no like it
00267         {
00268             // Is the work done ?
00269             ThreadSafeSection.EnterMutex();
00270             Done = NbServicesReady == (int)SearchServices.GetNumberOfElements();
00271             ThreadSafeSection.LeaveMutex();
00272
00273             if ( Done == true )
00274             {
00275                 return true;
00276             }
00277
00278             // Wait
00279             Thread::Sleep( 10 );
00280         }
00281         // never here
00282         return true;
00283     }
00284     else
00285     {
00286         ElapsedTime CountWaitedTime;
00287         Done = false;
00288         while( Done == false ) // was for(;;) but new version of MS compiler do no like it
00289         {
00290             // Is the work done ?
00291             ThreadSafeSection.EnterMutex();
00292             Done = NbServicesReady == (int)SearchServices.GetNumberOfElements();
00293             ThreadSafeSection.LeaveMutex();
00294
00295             if ( Done == true || CountWaitedTime.Get() >= DelayMax )
00296             {
00297                 return Done;
00298             }
00299
00300             Thread::Sleep( 10 );
00301         }
00302         // never here
00303         return true;
00304     }
00305 }
00306
00307 int WaitForDnsSdServices::GetNbOfSearchedServices()
00308 {
00309     int res;
00310
00311     ThreadSafeSection.EnterMutex();
00312     res = (int)SearchServices.GetNumberOfElements();
00313     ThreadSafeSection.LeaveMutex();
00314
00315     return res;
00316 }
00317
00318 SearchService & WaitForDnsSdServices::operator[](int nPos)
00319 {
00320     int i;
00321     SearchService * pSearchService = NULL;
00322
00323     ThreadSafeSection.EnterMutex();
00324
00325     if ( nPos < 0 || nPos >= (int)SearchServices.GetNumberOfElements() )
00326     {
00327         ThreadSafeSection.LeaveMutex();
00328         throw ServiceException( "Out of band" ) ;
00329     }
00330
00331     // Search in the list and return the value
00332     for( i = 0, SearchServices.First(); SearchServices.NotAtEnd(); i++, SearchServices.Next() )
00333     {
00334         if ( i == nPos )
00335         {
00336             pSearchService = SearchServices.GetCurrent();
00337         }
00338     }
00339     ThreadSafeSection.LeaveMutex();
00340
00341     return *pSearchService;
00342 }
00343
00344 bool SearchService::IsAvailable()
00345 {
00346     return (IsResolved == false);
00347 }
